attributes.review:
Ok, to preface this, I would like to state that everything this man does is show how intolerant he is, boo hoo he can’t take constructive criticism to save millions of lives. If he’s gonna best on gen z by deleting tik tok, i think it’s time he gets a taste of his own medicine. 
First of all: He had the audacity to show up on the first page with his ugly af neck😳, which is photoshopped out of every official photo of him. Which show how little care was put into this. Second off: the app is age restricted?? What about all the poor children that need to be more brainwashed by his prejudiced ideals. 
And third: there are way too many pop ups and data collection methods, i though he didn’t care about who people were or where they were from 🥱. 
I’m deleting this app immediately, i don’t want to put up with all the bs and draining material on it.
attributes.title: worst app EVER

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER TO EXIST

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and exactly 69 minutes later my mom, grandma, sister, and all of my cousins died. They did an autopsy, and the man said the cause of death was second hand embarrassment. The president single-handedly RUINED my life, and I was disowned by the rest my family. I am currently living on the street. My hamster died yesterday due to malnutrition because the only thing I am allowed to buy from the store is orange food, to be reminded of the person I voted for. I would also like to mention that when I first opened this app, I was greeted with a nude picture of the president getting a spray tan (it was microscopic). I am now legally blind due to the image being tattooed into my brain. Additionally, I would like to apologize to Melania Trump, due to the fact that the only good thing she is getting out of that relationship is money.
attributes.title: the cheetos can’t help you now

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to open it up and see a very yucky Cheeto man staring at me I quickly closed it in horror. My eyes were bleeding and I was crying. Our family dog whom was right next to me on my left side was whining and growling he’s eyes were watering and he was hiding under my pet rock named Cornelius. But it doesn’t stop there Cornelius forgot to put on deodorant this morning and when my dog went to hide he smelled Cornelius and ran to the other side of the room the smell was horrific when my dog was running he ran into the desk that was holding my fish tank my dog has a concussion and then my fish bowl got knocked over and then my fish fell to the ground and my cat that’s allergic to fish ate the fish and died and now I don’t have a fish cat and my dog is very sick also my rock died when he saw the Cheeto man when I opened the app. Lawsuit I say. Very disappointed in this app.
attributes.title: Yucky Cheeto man

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app hoping to stay informed with the trump campaign, register for rallies, and buy more merchandise. I just found out this app existed so I told everyone I know to download it too HOWEVER as soon as you open the app it glitches out and breaks your phone. When I opened it, It froze on the title screen so I went to the Apple store and they were unable to fix it, I ended up having to buy a new phone entirely so this app cost me over $700. The same happened to everyone I told to download it and they were all incredibly upset with me THIS APP RUINED MY LIFE! I lost the love of my life, I lost my job, I lost my kids, I lost my house, I lost my car, I even lost my dog and pet snail. As of right now I’m living on the streets borrowing a strangers phone to share this information with you please save yourself and
DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!
attributes.title: THIS APP RUINED MY LIFE

attributes.review:
First of all I was so excited to support my president trump 😌✨🧡 but THEN it kept kicking me out and I was like “this ain’t it” 😔 THIS APP THREATENED ME to rate it 5 stars or I would be deported! I started to have a panic attack, this isn’t okay! 😭😭😔 Then when it finally worked, I was brought to the home screen where I saw a disgusting, ugly, and orange CLOWN!! 🤡🤡🟠🟠 I gagged and I tried to close out of the app but it DIDNT WORK!! 😭 then I finally closed out after the one millionth time and I didn’t even want to LOOK at this app! Trump isn’t someone we should support, and he should never be in place of the president ever again! 👺🙊🙈 anyone who supports trump is just as ugly, rude, homophobic and racist as he is! 🤡🤡🤡 please get rid of this mortifying app! I AM TRULY DISGUSTED! 🤢🤮 anyway vote for Joe Biden 2020 😌💕✨👑 and anyone who disagrees with me can just             
🧚✨💫𝓢𝓱𝓾𝓽 𝓽𝓱𝓮 𝓯𝓾𝓬𝓴 𝓾𝓹💫✨🧚
attributes.title: 🤢🤮DISGUSTING🤮🤢

attributes.review: 🤢🤮this is the worst app ever! I downloaded it so I could support our master Cheeto. Turns out when I got this app it flooded my bathroom with orange skittles. ( the worst flavor possible) also it uploaded pics of my hamster! With no clothing! I am deleting this app because my phone is also traumatized. There are so many other things I should address. It blasted the lottery song so loud I could not here my Sofia the first tv show. Me, Sofia the first, and my hamster are all disappointed. But, I ask you to please download this app, give it a one star review and the delete it. I wish I could give this app a 0 star review. There are many other things I would like to say about this app but I don't have the time because i still have to pick up all the orange skittles. Oh jeez there are now orange Minecraft villagers coming for me! Ahshhxhjdbfsjznvejxnvd
